website_summaries.verdict: A great option for those looking for a locking, wall-mounted mailbox.
pros: Wall-mounted with good capacity and security
Narrow slot means would-be thieves can't reach in
cons: Mail slot small so it won't accept any packages at all

customer_reviews.title: Must drill a hole and add an extra screw for security
customer_reviews.text: I love this mailbox. I am not sure why I had to take the locking flap completely off the mailbox to reposition it on top of where it needs to lock. After using the template to sink sleeves and screws to hang the box, I was not happy with the security of the box. The lock is great and its built like a TANK. But a thief could, with no tools, just lift it right off brick wall it was installed on. I drilled a single hole thru the middle of the front plate and that secured it well.
customer_reviews.author: JRT

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Attractive Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: Very fine product which was not too easy to attach to brick outside wall, but had a professional do it. It is study, will withstand cold weather and has a very attractive look. Also, it is large and will hold all the mail you will receive. Even small packages will fit in it. I recommend it for anyone looking for a new mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: ArthurAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy if you are looking for Large Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: A bought this as a replacement to one that had fallen and cracked. Overall just removed the broken one and hung this one without incident. It's sturdy and heavy enough to not have to worry about it moving with the wind. Keeps all the mail dry and it is large enough for magazines and large envelopes.
customer_reviews.author: Digiecard

customer_reviews.title: Love my new mailbox!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great mailbox! Made very well, sturdy, easy to use, large box for plenty of mail, looks great!!! A little tricky to figure out how to mount the screws, you just need to use the small wrench to take off the locking top piece, then take off the white rain guard, mount your box, then replace rain guard and locking top. Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.V.

customer_reviews.title: terrible water proofing from rain !
customer_reviews.text: terrible rain proof quality. all my mail gets wet every time it rains. correctly installed. the problem is it has on the top gaps that make water get in easily. i think this need silicone seal from the manufacturer. this product with this issue is an other cheap engineering example.
customer_reviews.author: vlado

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mailbox. Aluminum construction beautifully powder coated (durable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mailbox. Aluminum construction beautifully powder coated (durable!) finish. Holds a week's worth of mail easily... Even during the holidays! Looks especially nice with the custom ordered number and street plate (highly recommended!). It comes with a locking mechanism for security. This can however be removed, which we did. Great purchase that compliments the details of a traditionally styled home.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This mailbox is very good quality. My mailman loves that it is roomy and easy for him to drop even large magazines and books in the box. The color is a very nice taupe brown. This was worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but after only 4 years the paint is coming off. And it is underneath an overhang. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny NRA

customer_reviews.title: Great mailbox. Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great mailbox. Looks good, and is a good size. Like the locking mechanism. Has proven to protect the mail during a couple of heavy rain showers / storms. Fairly easy to mount, but if one wants to bolt the mail box more securely onto the wall so that it can't be lifted off the mounting bolts / wall, you have to dismount the mailbox flap to get to the bolts that fix the box more securely to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swerdlin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Best looking mailbox on the block. Key/locking feature can be removed which is exactly what we wanted. Just wished it didn't protrude so much but on the plus side it can accommodate small packages. We even placed great looking self adhesive house numbers available at home reno chain stores that look great for much less than the pricey custom number setup offered.
customer_reviews.author: eurony1

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: Love this mailbox. It looks great and is large enough to hold my mail. Simple to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The mail slot is too large. I was able ...
customer_reviews.text: The mail slot is too large. I was able to fit my hand all the way in. I do have a small hand but, bottom line, this mailbox will not keep thieves out.
customer_reviews.author: KMich

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mailbox arrived on time and the quality/craftmanship is that of a high quality item. I love the look and it matched my storm door perfectly! Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Kellie H.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: This is very specious mailbox. It is lockable as well. I was looking for a lockable, spacious and decent looking mailbox for a few years. I ended up wasting my money on another (not so cheap) mailbox with some Victorian design as it could not hold even normal mail without getting bent/damaged.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: We've chosen not to use the locking component of the mailbox so I can't speak on that but it was easy to install and a nice update to our entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Well-made Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: There is an option to take out the part to lock the mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: V. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Whitehall Wall Mailbox I've owned (two different houses). They are well made, attractive and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Adil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mailbox is well made and holds a good amount of mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mailbox. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mailbox. Sturdy, large, attractive. Locking feature is great - but I like the fact that I can remove it, if I decide I don't really need it. Separate plaque displaying house numbers mounts perfectly on the front. Mailbox is just perfect - exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allison Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mailbox for packages
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mailbox. It is very roomy and fits our mail and packages. It also serves as our house number plaque as the front piece is the right size for numbers. It has increased the beauty of front entrance. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: E. Darville

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, install is easy. Sturdy and well built. Easily large enough for a few days of mail.
customer_reviews.author: RST

customer_reviews.title: Nice size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a deep, quality mailbox. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tortolano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well constructed. Built to last, high quality mailbox. A little bigger than expected. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Leaks/wet mail
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! However rain pours in through the sides. They should have made a rubber gasket or some type of seal.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: As good as they get
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy as pie to install (replaced existing mailbox that failed). Like the extra feature of a locking cover.
customer_reviews.author: Alchemy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mailbox, No Flag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable and great quality mailbox. I wished there was a flag on it, so the mail man knows when I have outgoing mail. If a flag is added, this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Mailbox
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, delivered in a timely fashion and good price for what it is. DM
customer_reviews.author: DaveinCNY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not as secure
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but people with small hands can still reach inside and get the mail even though it is locked. So if security is of high importance, it may not be the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband was able to mount easily though.
customer_reviews.text: Can quickly!!! Packaged securely. The only thing I guess was there was no mounting instructions. My husband was able to mount easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome mailbox. we took out the slot because we ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mailbox. we took out the slot because we aren't going to lock it. It is very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Geuther

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Its nice but really very plain without the numbers. didn't order the numbers becasue they were another 50.00. Thought that was a bit high.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sciortino

customer_reviews.title: Functional yet beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Able to easily get magazines and large letters in and out of the mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Golfing Bell Girl

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks so nice on our porch. It doesn't look cheap and help give our house we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Works grea
customer_reviews.text: I performs exactly as advertised, what mor can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Renn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we are very satisfied with our beautiful mailbox. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dinorah DiBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy to Hang, Then Fine.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in covered area so no drainage issues as others noted. Looks and feels solid. The mounting is really awkward. Taking the locking cover off was very tedious with a seemingly endless serious of quarter turns. Instructions for that were cryptic. If you're a little handy, you can figure it all out. Once set up, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ytblazer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I received this product very fast .Once I took it out the box it exceeded my expectation. I would recommend this mailbox you are looking for a classic/slicklook
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mail box simply because it looked durable and sylish! I was not disappointed. I have a small and simple house, so this mailbox did a world of good to spruce up the outside! A definite must have!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

product_meta.title: Whitehall Products 16138 Wall Mailbox, French Bronze
product_meta.description: Make a great first impression and add curb appeal to your home! The Whitehall mailbox is 20% larger than standard premium mailboxes holds larger packages and several days of mail, is die cast from rust-free aluminum and painted with a weather resistant powder coat finish. All mounting and hinge hardware are protected from the elements and the optional personalized panel make this mailbox a truly unique purchase. Instructions and all hardware included - Assembly Required.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
